revision.text: Possibly: Apparatus Biblicus: or; an Introduction to the Holy Scriptures. In Three Books. Book I. Of the Origin, History, and Antiquities of the Jews. Book II. Of the Canon, Authors, Original Texts, Versions, Editions and Interpretations of the Scriptures. Book III. Of the False Gods, Animals, Precious Stones, Diseases, and Publick Sports mentioned in the Scriptures. Together with an Explanation of Scriptural Names. And a New Method of Reading the Scriptures. Done in English from the French, with Notes and Additions. Illustrated with Thirty Copper-plates. By Bernard Lamy. (London : Printed by S. Palmer, MDCCXXIII. [1723]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2408610~S1
